alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Harnett and southwestern Wake Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fuquay-Varina, or 10 miles north of Lillington, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, Apex, Holly Springs, Lake Wheeler, Raven Rock State Park and Duncan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
